BackstoryDef.title: Bone Circle Initiate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up within the sacred bone circles of the Zhul, learning to carve spiraling patterns before [PAWN_pronoun] could properly walk. [PAWN_possessive] childhood was spent listening to the whispers of ancestral spirits trapped in skull decorations.

BackstoryDef.title: Moustache Apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth as an apprentice to the tribe's master groomers, learning the sacred art of moustache cultivation. [PAWN_pronoun] can still remember the first time [PAWN_pronoun] successfully created a perfect spiral.

BackstoryDef.title: Feast Attendant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up attending the tribe's cannibalistic feasts, learning to prepare humanlike meat in traditional ways. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a sophisticated palate for the sacred cuisine and an understanding of its spiritual significance.

BackstoryDef.title: Curled Savage
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a warrior in the Zhul raiding parties, [PAWN_possessive] moustache growing more elaborate with each successful raid. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to channel ancestral spirits through [PAWN_possessive] facial hair during combat.

BackstoryDef.title: Spirit-Eater
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] achieved the elite rank of Spirit-Eater, capable of consuming the very souls of enemies through cannibalistic rituals. [PAWN_possessive] moustache contains the screams of dozens of devoured foes.

BackstoryDef.title: Bone-Chief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] rose to leadership within the Zhul tribe through ritual combat and superior grooming techniques. [PAWN_possessive] bone diadem marks [PAWN_objective] as a master of both war and ceremony.

BackstoryDef.title: Bone Carver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years perfecting the art of carving intricate patterns from the skulls of enemies. [PAWN_possessive] work decorates the most sacred Zhul ceremonies and [PAWN_possessive] spiraling designs are said to trap evil spirits.

BackstoryDef.title: Spirit Listener
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed the rare ability to hear the whispers of ancestral spirits trapped in bones and moustaches. [PAWN_pronoun] served as a spiritual advisor to the tribe, interpreting omens and guiding ritual practices.

BackstoryDef.title: Exiled Curled One
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out from the Zhul tribe for unknown transgressions, forced to wander the rim with only [PAWN_possessive] moustache as a reminder of [PAWN_possessive] former life. [PAWN_pronoun] struggles with the shame of exile while still honoring the old ways.
